mapper.sql: TRANSFER_ID, ACC_DATE, MER_CODE, MER_NAME, MER_ACC_CODE, CCY_CODE, TRAN_AMOUNT, CUR_BAL, RESERVE_BAL, FREEZE_BAL, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY,BATCH_NO
mapper.insert:
select 'TR'||to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||SEQ_TRN_TRANSFER.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into TCOR_TRN_TRANSFER (TRANSFER_ID, ACC_DATE, MER_CODE, MER_NAME, MER_ACC_CODE, CCY_CODE, TRAN_AMOUNT, CUR_BAL, RESERVE_BAL, FREEZE_BAL, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, BATCH_NO) values (#{transferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{curBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserveBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update TCOR_TRN_TRANSFER
ACC_DATE = #{accDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MER_CODE = #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_ACC_CODE = #{merAccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCY_CODE = #{ccyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_AMOUNT = #{tranAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUR_BAL = #{curBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RESERVE_BAL = #{reserveBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FREEZE_BAL = #{freezeBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TRANSFER_ID = #{transferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS in ('0','2')
